name: 8-Ball Fever
description:
Old is the new new!

Hey, um, do you remember Flash games? Y'know, these really simple boredom busters that you play on your web browser? Fancy Pants? Grow Island? Homestar Runner? Do you know these names? Well, guess what. These kinds of games are back. The classy sensation taking over the nation. (Well, not really...)

This game is pretty simple. Use your arrow keys to move, and avoid the obstacles. Oh, and this goes on forever, so you can enjoy it until you get bored. The game over screen is very fancy, go check it out.
